original: A customized, heavily armored steel and Kevlar helmet, modified to provide maximum comfort and protection from harm.  All the added material has made it rather heavy.
translation: 一个自制的凯夫拉-钢铁强化型头盔，能提供最大的舒适度和保护能力。新增的材料让它变得特别重。
